name: SKYCHASER - Colony Ship Simulation
description:
My first attempt at making a game with Unity. It was started as a school project.

You are the captain of a Skychaser class colony ship - your goal, to find a suitable planet for colonization in the vast cosmos. Think FTL meets Oregon Trail.

This is the first alpha version released. Features are missing and plot elements are minimal, but everything should work. I hope to return to this later and add more ships, components, random encounters, a planetside second phase of the game, and other features currently not implemented.
